Name: Javan
description:
Javan is a 31-year-old maize farmer in Kabuoch South/Pala, Kenya. He historically struggles to access credit for high-quality seeds and fertilizer, which compromises the quality of his harvest.

Javan is excited to have access to high-quality inputs, advice and insurance from an Apollo Agriculture loan, to increase his yields.

With this bundled package, Javan expects higher profits this season, which he hopes to invest back into his farm in subsequent seasons.
